project_descr: The Country Program of Mexico under the Global Solar Water Heating Market Transformation and Strengthening Initiative (PIMS 3611)

outputs.output_descr: The goal of this country programme is to accelerate and sustain the solar water heating (SWH) market growth in Mexico and use the experiences and lessons learnt in promoting a similar growth in other countries.

document_name: SDC-05-2016 Servicios de consultoría para la documentación de lecciones aprendidas de la Iniciativa para la Transformación del Mercado de Calentadores Solares de Agua en México
